trans-unit.source: What is Azure Scheduler? | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: What is Azure Scheduler? | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Azure Scheduler allows you to declaratively describe actions to run in the cloud. It then schedules and runs those actions automatically.
trans-unit.target: Azure Scheduler allows you to declaratively describe actions to run in the cloud. It then schedules and runs those actions automatically.

trans-unit.source: What is Azure Scheduler?
trans-unit.target: What is Azure Scheduler?

trans-unit.source: Azure Scheduler allows you to declaratively describe actions to run in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: Azure Scheduler allows you to declaratively describe actions to run in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: It then schedules and runs those actions automatically.
trans-unit.target: It then schedules and runs those actions automatically.

trans-unit.source: Scheduler does this by using <link><linkText>the Azure portal</linkText><title></title></link>, code, <link><linkText>REST API</linkText><title></title></link>, or Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Scheduler does this by using <link><linkText>the Azure portal</linkText><title></title></link>, code, <link><linkText>REST API</linkText><title></title></link>, or Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: Scheduler creates, maintains, and invokes scheduled work.
trans-unit.target: Scheduler creates, maintains, and invokes scheduled work.

trans-unit.source: Scheduler does not host any workloads or run any code.
trans-unit.target: Scheduler does not host any workloads or run any code.

trans-unit.source: It only invokes code hosted elsewhere—in Azure, on-premises, or with another provider.
trans-unit.target: It only invokes code hosted elsewhere—in Azure, on-premises, or with another provider.

trans-unit.source: It invokes via HTTP, HTTPS, or a storage queue.
trans-unit.target: It invokes via HTTP, HTTPS, or a storage queue.

trans-unit.source: Scheduler schedules <link><linkText>jobs</linkText><title></title></link>, keeps a history of job execution results that one can review, and deterministically and reliably schedules workloads to be run.
trans-unit.target: Scheduler schedules <link><linkText>jobs</linkText><title></title></link>, keeps a history of job execution results that one can review, and deterministically and reliably schedules workloads to be run.

trans-unit.source: Azure WebJobs (part of the Web Apps feature in Azure App Service) and other Azure scheduling capabilities use Scheduler in the background.
trans-unit.target: Azure WebJobs (part of the Web Apps feature in Azure App Service) and other Azure scheduling capabilities use Scheduler in the background.

trans-unit.source: The <link><linkText>Scheduler REST API</linkText><title></title></link> helps manage the communication for these actions.
trans-unit.target: The <link><linkText>Scheduler REST API</linkText><title></title></link> helps manage the communication for these actions.

trans-unit.source: As such, Scheduler supports <link><linkText>complex schedules and advanced recurrence</linkText><title></title></link> easily.
trans-unit.target: As such, Scheduler supports <link><linkText>complex schedules and advanced recurrence</linkText><title></title></link> easily.

trans-unit.source: There are several scenarios that lend themselves to the usage of Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: There are several scenarios that lend themselves to the usage of Scheduler.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: _Recurring application actions:_ Periodically gathering data from Twitter into a feed.
trans-unit.target: _Recurring application actions:_ Periodically gathering data from Twitter into a feed.

trans-unit.source: _Daily maintenance:_ Daily pruning of logs, performing backups, and other maintenance tasks.
trans-unit.target: _Daily maintenance:_ Daily pruning of logs, performing backups, and other maintenance tasks.

trans-unit.source: For example, an administrator may choose to back up the database at 1:00 A.M. every day for the next nine months.
trans-unit.target: For example, an administrator may choose to back up the database at 1:00 A.M. every day for the next nine months.

trans-unit.source: Scheduler allows you to create, update, delete, view, and manage jobs and <link><linkText>job collections</linkText><title></title></link> programmatically, by using scripts, and in the portal.
trans-unit.target: Scheduler allows you to create, update, delete, view, and manage jobs and <link><linkText>job collections</linkText><title></title></link> programmatically, by using scripts, and in the portal.
